ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but it is not up to you whether or not he is purified.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Though it is not your concern if he should not grow (in fulness).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: though you are not to blame if he would not cleanse himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: though you will not be questioned even if he never purifies himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And you have nothing to lose if he does not become pure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: What does it matter to you if he will not become pure
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And no blame is on you if he would not purify himself
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: though it is not thy concern, if he does not cleanse himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Yet it is not thy concern if he grow not (in grace).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: though you are not to be blamed if he would not purify himself --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Whereas it is not on thee that he is not cleansed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: though you are not liable if he does not purify himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Though it is no blame to thee if he grow not (in spiritual understanding).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: What does it matter to you if he will not become pure (from disbelief, you are only a Messenger, your duty is to convey the Message of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: although it is not for you to be concerned if he remained unpurified.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Though you are not liable if he does not purify himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:7] yet it is not your concern if he does not cleanse himself, [if he does not] believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Yet it is not thy concern if he grow not (in grace)) it is not your concern if these three men do not believe in Allah's divine Oneness.
